The commenter has stressed that all three universities mentioned (including Options A and B) have excellent reputations pertaining to Engineering. 
However, the distinguishing feature of the North Carolina State University, according to the commenter is its proximity to potential employers. 
This person emphasizes that such nearness to employers simplifies the processes connected with interviews, traveling, finding accommodation during summer internships within the extensive discussion of convenience factor. 
The person then proceeds to hypothesize that if there are internships that take place during the school year, then North Carolina State University undeniably possesses an advantage over other educational institutions taken into context.

### 
B is preferred over A
